_sText:
Map by: Hellraz0r

NOTE: .BSP UPDATED AS OF APRIL 9TH 2007 12:54PM GMT!
RE DOWNLOAD IF DOWNLOADED PREVIOUSLY.

Scroll down and read for more information.

ANY BUGS/SUGGESTIONS, PLEASE EMAIL ME AT THE FOLLOWING EMAIL:

hellraz0r1337 (at) gmail dot com


Mission:


Counter-Terrorists: Infiltrate via entrance, or vents into the office building and rescue the four employees held hostage by the Terrorists. You must be silent, use stealth and tactics. You must succeed in this mission by any means necessary.

Terrorists: You must be prepared for any infiltration whatsoever. Secure the building and the four employee hostages. Stop the Counter-Terrorists from rescuing the four employees you have taken hostage. You must prevent the Counter-Terrorists mission to succeed. 


NOTES: Do not decompile this map and re-release it. I know there are many errors in the console, Ignore these as It's the Source engine itself, not the map. The map works completely fine, and is working like it should. Note this was upgraded from a beta version of the map, and has a new layout and much more new content, including custom content.
